doc.name: revFontUnload
doc.summary: Unloads a font file from memory.

description.p: The revFontUnload command unloads a font file from memory.
The fontFile is the path of the font file to unload
The revFontUnload command puts empty into the result if successful. Otherwise an error string is put into the result

Note: After unloading a font, the fontNames function will return the names of the remaining fonts that are loaded. To determine the name of the unloaded font, compare the value of the fontNames before and after unloading.
Ensure fonts are not in use before unloading them to avoid unexpected behaviour.
